item.title: Canon’s viral compact camera from 2019 just got an unexpected makeover – meet the G7 X Mark III 30th Anniversary Edition
item.description: Canon marks 30 years of PowerShot compact cameras with a limited edition of its popular G7 X Mark III

item.title: Canon’s RF 14mm F1.4L VCM is exceptionally lightweight, fast and wide — it’s the dream lens for astrophotographers
item.description: Canon adds a sixth prime lens to its range of VCM hybird lenses for RF-mount mirrorless cameras, the Canon RF 14mm F1.4L VCM, plus a new fisheye zoom

item.title: Canon unveils a Limited Edition version of its popular G7 X III compact camera
item.description: Canon released its first PowerShot camera back in 1996 with a 0.5-megapixel sensor, helping kickstart the digital photo revolution. To celebrate that 30-year anniversary, the company has unveiled a Limited Edition version of its still-popular PowerShot G7 X III compact camera. It has a few unique touches but is otherwise the same as the original model released nearly seven years ago.The limited edition model has a new “graphite” color with a knurled front ring designed to exude “luxury and quality,” Canon wrote. It also carries 30 year anniversary logo printed on the body “to create a special ...

item.title: Zoom fisheye et courte focale ultra lumineuse : Canon dévoile deux nouvelles optiques grand-angle très originales
item.description: Canon a dévoilé deux nouveaux objectifs grand-angle particulièrement originaux pour ses boîtiers, un RF 7-14MM F2.8-3.5L Fisheye STM et un Canon RF 14 F1.4L VCM.
